      • isActivate

        public boolean isActivate()
        Return true if this attribute should be loaded from the DB. This should be true for all persistent, non-hidden attributes. It may also be true for hidden attributes if this entity is expected to be linked to other instances. This allows the DB handler to load attributes that might be hidden in this entity but non-hidden in the linked instance.
        Returns:

        public void executeDerivedAttributeForGet(AttributeInstance attributeInstance)

        public EntityDef getHashKeyParent()

      • isSequencingAscending

        public Boolean isSequencingAscending()
        Returns true if this AttributeDef is a sequencing attribute in ascending order, false if it's descending, and null if it's not a sequencing attribute. See EntityDef.getSequencingAttributes() for more.
        Returns:
